Browser Comparison

Web gaming technologies as currently supported by the most popular browsers.

Run Test Re-Run Test

How does your browser stack up?

This test suite will check if your browser supports a variety of features and technologies that power modern web games. Not all of these features are utilized in all games, but better support means compatibility with a wider variety of games.
Learn more about these technologies.
